quote: Let go of what does not make you happy.
author: Unbekannt

quote: We often carry a lot of unnecessary burden with us. Let it go.
author: Marie Kondo

quote: The more things you own, the more they own you.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: We often collect things because we hope they will make us happy someday. But happiness does not lie in things, it lies within ourselves.
author: Marc and Angel Chernoff

quote: A tidy room means a tidy mind.
author: Marie Kondo

quote: Tidy your space, transform your life.
author: Marie Kondo

quote: Simplicity is the key to happiness.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: We often need less than we think.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: We cannot add more until we have taken away what we no longer need.
author: Lao Tzu
